name: 2GETHER
description:
Dive into a thrilling world of ADVENTURE as you set out to explore the ALTERNATE REALITY version of yourself using virtual and real-life objects to unravel the secret of your alter-ego, unveil the truth behind Earth C-148 and to destroy the BananaVirus that's causing the multiverse to merge into one.

A story of humor and action.

Can truth sets you free?

Developed by Matthew Johannes C. Balubar (@BSK_Baesick)

Discord: @BSK_Baesick

CONTROLS:
Mouse & Keyboard.

NOTE:

This is just a work of fiction. 

Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the game designer's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

There is a mechanic that requires you to download real-life resources that you will use in order to progress in the game. Don't worry, it's safe.
